segments.text: What is this eviction notice for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The notice you received is a 30 - day notice to vacate .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I mentioned to you before that you need to keep up with your rent . This notice to evict is letting you know that I mean business .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can ’ t just throw me out on the street !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You have 30 days to catch up on your rent , or a sheriff will evict you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will you still throw me out if I make the rent payment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can stay , but you might think about looking for a less expensive living arrangement if you are having trouble making the payments .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am going to take care of the rent payment right now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . The payment needs to be in the form of cash or a cashier ’ s check .
segments.speaker: S2
